markdownRemark.html:
Why would someone need a technical blog in 2019? Everything is written, everything is said, you say.

I think this place is especially usefull when I am digging into fields of programming that I am not familiar with and want to try out some R&D.

I will start this blog with series of articles about Unreal Engine 4 and C++. Reason is simple: these are the technologies I work with most often nowadays.

Happy reading!

frontmatter.title: What if my Unreal Engine 4 pointer is not valid?
frontmatter.description: In this article I will briefly explain the need of thinking twice before writing check?
